Meeting at Market

The City’s Gathering Place
Get In Touch 
Meeting at Market, the city’s gathering place for a pint, pub fare, and your favorite sports broadcast. Never miss out on your home team as you savor prime city views and elevated classics in our retro-inspired space.
View Menu 
Meet & Enjoy

HOURS

12PM — 11PM
Monday – Friday 
11AM — 11PM
Saturday – Sunday 
PRIVATE DINING

Large Party Dining

Ready to celebrate? Meeting at Market is the perfect place for your next gathering. With room for up to 20 guests, it’s the ideal location for a birthday, anniversary, graduation party or any private dining group.
Call Us Email Us Inspired 
Gather & Relax

[Page Title: Meetings and Events at The Charleston PlaceThe Charleston Place HomeCP logoInstagram LogoFacebook Logo]

Skip to main content Close 
Mobile Menu
01 The Hotel 02 Accommodations 03 The Club 04 Dining 05 Spa & Wellness 06 Meetings & Events 07 Experiences 08 Offers & Delights 09 Contact Us 010 Tales from the Living Room Reserve 
FOR ALL OCCASIONS

Meetings & Events
contact us 
Share your vision.
We’ll do the rest. 
Whether you’re planning a corporate meeting, national conference, intimate wedding, or grand gala, we offer the spaces, amenities, and gracious service to create extraordinary bespoke experiences that build loyalty, nurture relationships, and create enduring impact.

Your Event, Our Setting

Venues

Weddings

BHC Events

Ballrooms

Unique Spaces

Outdoor Spaces

Outdoor Spaces

Historic Homes

Spotlight Venues

DISCOVER CHARLESTON

More to Offer

Services

Group Experiences

Our Team

Services

Services

Exclusive Services
Warm and gracious, our talented team has deep experience in planning, design, food and beverage, logistics, and service from start to finish. 
Catering
From delectable breakfast buffets to exquisite dinners, afternoon snacks, wine programs, and everything in between. 
Personalized Transportation
Choose from an alluring array of motor coaches, sprinter vans, or luxury vehicles. 
Customized Airport Transfers
Luxury SUVs and sprinter vans can all be at your beck and call. contact us 
Group Experiences

Group Experiences

Group Adventures,
Collective Joy

From boating, fishing, and beach adventures to historic, culinary, and cultural experiences, we craft enjoyable events that nurture healthy competition, create conversation, and build lasting bonds.
Discover 
Our Team

Our Team

Gracious Spirit and a
Dedicated Team

With more than a century of collective experience, our award-winning meeting planners know what it takes to make events of all sizes and style successful and memorable. Feel confident knowing you’ll have the care and undivided attention of highly-skilled specialists to anticipate and meet every need and exceed every expectation.
About us For any occasion 40,000 Square feet of ballroom, conference rooms, hospitality suites and more Charleston Praise 
From the folks we worked directly with to everyone we interacted with it was a TOP notch experience.
Raynor Garage Doors 
Our meeting grew from 400 to 800 because of the draw of The Charleston Place.
South Carolina School Boards Association 
I have been in the Continuing Education business for 25 years and have worked with many hotels. I have never had a better experience.
American Motility Society 
Personable, not stuffy, five-diamond service. It’s a meeting planner’s dream since they are on top of everything. They are proactive and one step ahead of most other hotels.
COBANK 
I have nothing but the best things to say about our experience. The customer service, food, and facilities were fantastic and our guests were extremely pleased with the accommodations.
HUDSON AUTOMOTIVE 
I’ve been to many hotels, but never have I continued to reflect back on the professionalism and charm of the staff.
FEDEX 
I literally haven’t ever been to a hotel where the fabric of the place just sang because of the people who just so obviously loved their own hotel and were so proud to work there.
CONDE NAST TRAVELER 
Off-site events were great—the harbor cruise, plantation tours, carriage rides and Yorktown dinner were all spectacular.
AMERIS Bank 
The program went on without any hitches and our Awards Banquet was knocked right out of the park… I truly appreciate all of you doing such an amazing job.  It was flawless and well done.  Everyone loved The Charleston Place!
UNITED LABORATORIES, INC. 
Tell Us About Your Event
Prefer to talk? Give us a call on 1+800.611.5549

[Page Title: Special Offers and Packages at The Charleston PlaceThe Charleston Place HomeCP logoInstagram LogoFacebook Logo]

Skip to main content Close 
Mobile Menu
01 The Hotel 02 Accommodations 03 The Club 04 Dining 05 Spa & Wellness 06 Meetings & Events 07 Experiences 08 Offers & Delights 09 Contact Us 010 Tales from the Living Room Reserve 
Offers & Delights

in the best of Charleston’s food, drink, art, culture, and the pursuit of true relaxation with an array of exclusive offers.
Indulge 
Charleston continues to wow visitors from around the world with its mix of natural beauty, storied history, and vibrant culture. Here, you’ll immerse yourself in it all. From rejuvenating spa services to historic adventures and culinary explorations, you’ll find something amazing for every taste, mood, and occasion.

Made with joy in mind

Exclusive Offers and Delights

Arrive in Style

Enjoy 10% off your stay, complimentary valet parking, and two nights of elevated comfort and convenience. With curated amenities and a seamless arrival, this offer makes it easy to experience Charleston in effortless style.
Details Luxury accommodations Seamless arrival with complimentary valet parking Nightly turndown service 
In-room welcome amentity

Valid for stays now through March 31. Two-night minimum required. Blackout dates apply, including . Offer is subject to availability and may include additional restrictions.
Disclaimer: February 13-14, March 13-14, and March 27-28 Book Now 
Enhance Your Stay with Club Level Access

Elevate your stay with exclusive access to our Club Lounge, now relocated to a refreshed floor plan for a limited time. Enjoy personalized service, dedicated staff, and complimentary culinary offerings, from breakfast to after-dinner indulgences, in a reimagined atmosphere of luxury.
Details 
Luxury accommodations

Club Lounge access
Reserve 
Stay A Little Longer

Why stay two nights when you can enjoy greater savings and even more time to explore Charleston by staying three consecutive nights? Extend your getaway and savor every moment of luxury, charm, and unforgettable experiences.
Details 
Luxury accommodations

Up to 15% off a three-night stay
Reserve 
Breakfast in Charleston

After a glorious night’s sleep, awaken to a delicious breakfast in bed or at The Palmetto Cafe, where fresh, locally inspired dishes start your day on a delightful note.
Details 
Luxury accommodations

Daily breakfast at The Palmetto Cafe
Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. Not combinable with any other packages or offers. Valid for new bookings only. Disclaimer: Reserve 
The Cooper I Experience

Experience Charleston from the water with a private charter aboard our custom Hinckley yacht. Available only to guests of The Charleston Place, this experience offers a serene and sophisticated way to explore the city’s historic harbor, all from the comfort of a beautifully appointed vessel, Cooper I. 

Whether you’re celebrating something special or simply chasing the horizon, this package invites you to slow down, take in the sea breeze, and see the Holy City from a fresh perspective.
Details Luxury accommodations 
two-hour
A private, captain-led charter aboard The Cooper I , our custom Hinckley yacht Flexible sail time, arranged seamlessly through our Concierge team 
A bespoke welcome amenity awaits as you step aboard the Hinckley
Disclaimer: Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. Not combinable with any other packages or offers. Valid for new bookings only. Reserve 
The Suite Life

Lounge in a luxurious and spacious suite and embrace the charm of our cosmopolitan hideaway as you savor breakfast in bed or in our garden cafe.
Details 
Package includes:

Daily breakfast at The Palmetto Cafe or in-room dining ($30 credit per person, per day)

Daily valet parking for one vehicle

: Two-night minimum stay required. Restrictions may apply. Subject to availability.
Disclaimer Reserve 
Furry Friend in Residence

All are welcome at The Charleston Place, including your furry companion. Let us make your pet feel like a VI-Pet in Residence with a selection of items to enhance your stay.
Details 
Use of the following during your stay –

food and water bowls for use during your stay
Pet 
Custom Foggy Dog bed and bandanna for use during stay and to be taken home as a souvenir
pet 
Not required for a stay. Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. 7-day advance notice is required. Based on availability. Must be booked separately through the Concierge.
Disclaimer: pet Reserve 
Stay With Us
